description: Surya Man Gurung is a Nepalese politician and a member of the Nepali Congress party, serving as its district president in Taplejung District. He was appointed as the Minister of Labour and Employment by President Bidya Devi Bhandari on August 26, 2016, and served in this capacity until May 31, 2017. Gurung has also contested legislative elections, including the 1999 election for the Taplejung-1 constituency and the 2008 Constituent Assembly election.
short_description: Surya Man Gurung is a Nepalese politician and former Minister of Labour and Employment.
